title: Ready to Create Drop?
description: Complete below to configure your Drop

keySection.title: Configure Your Drop Key
keySection.dropKeyPlaceholder: Enter user secret to see your drop key

options.deleteOnAccess: Delete the Drop immediately after being accessed (maximum kept is 1 hour)
options.keep30Minutes: Keep the Drop for 30 minutes then delete
options.keep1Hour: Keep the Drop for 1 hour then delete

noteSection.label: Note:
noteSection.text: Once created, you will not be able to change the Drop Key or Retention Settings.
